title: 710-C
statement: C. Magic Odd Squaretime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputFind ann×nmatrix with different numbers from1ton2, so the sum in each row, column and both main diagonals are odd.InputThe only line contains odd integern(1 ≤n≤ 49).OutputPrintnlines withnintegers. All the integers should be different and from1ton2. The sum in each row, column and both main diagonals should be odd.ExamplesInput1Output1Input3Output2 1 43 5 76 9 8
